        stateName - Name of the state for schools.
        location - Location area of a school.
        control - Private State or City control.

        percentFemale - Lower limit for Percent Female.
        SATVerbal - Lower limit for SATVerbal.
        expenses - Lower limit for Expenses.
        percentEnrolled - Lower limit for Percent Enrolled.
        academicsScale - Lower limit for Academics Scale.

        qualityOfLifeScale - Lower limit for Quality Of Life Scale.
